channel.title: Service disruption (FIXED): no emails were sent out between 3AM and 4PM CEST
channel.description:
There was a disruption in the server that caused email traffic to be blocked. That means no notification emails of personal messages, replies or digests were getting out between 3AM and 4PM on April 27. This also prevented setting up a new account, or recover a lost password.
It's fixed now.
Sorry for the inconvenience!
